mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME, OL.ORDER_QUANTITY, O.ORDER_NO, O.ORDER_DATE, (OL.ORDER_QUANTITY*P.PRODUCT_PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE, OL.ORDER_STATUS, P.PRODUCT_NO FROM O_ORDER O, O_ORDER_LIST OL, PRODUCT P, MEMBER M WHERE O.ORDER_NO = OL.ORDER_NO AND OL.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO AND P.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND P.PRODUCT_TYPE = 1 AND M.BRAND_NAME= #{ brand_name } ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM O_ORDER O, O_ORDER_LIST OL WHERE O.ORDER_NO = OL.ORDER_NO

SELECT A.ORDER_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, C.PRODUCT_NAME, A.ORDER_ADDRESS, A.RECEIVER_NAME, A.ORDER_DATE, B.ORDER_QUANTITY, (B.ORDER_QUANTITY*C.PRODUCT_PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM O_ORDER A, O_ORDER_LIST B, PRODUCT C WHERE A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO AND B.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO AND A.ORDER_NO = #{ order_no } AND C.PRODUCT_NO = #{ product_no }

SELECT M.BRAND_NAME, S.* FROM MEMBER M, PRODUCT P, (SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, OL.ORDER_SIZE AS PRODUCT_SIZE, O.ORDER_NO, O.ORDER_DATE, (OL.ORDER_QUANTITY*P.PRODUCT_PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE, OL.ORDER_STATUS FROM O_ORDER O, O_ORDER_LIST OL, PRODUCT P, MEMBER M WHERE O.ORDER_NO = OL.ORDER_NO AND OL.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO AND O.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND M.MEMBER_NAME= #{member_name} ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC) S WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = P.MEMBER_NO AND P.PRODUCT_NO = S.PRODUCT_NO

SELECT O.RECEIVER_NAME, O.ORDER_ADDRESS, M.MEMBER_PHONE FROM O_ORDER O, O_ORDER_LIST OL, PRODUCT P, MEMBER M WHERE O.ORDER_NO = OL.ORDER_NO AND OL.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO AND O.ORDER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND O.ORDER_NO = #{order_no}

SELECT M.BRAND_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_SIZE, O.ORDER_NO, O.ORDER_DATE, O.TOTAL_PRICE, OL.ORDER_STATUS FROM MEMBER M, PRODUCT P, O_ORDER O, O_ORDER_LIST OL WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = P.MEMBER_NO AND O.ORDER_NO = OL.ORDER_NO AND OL.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO AND M.MEMBER_NAME = #{member_name} ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE ASC

SELECT K.PRODUCT_NO, A.ATT_NAME, M.BRAND_NAME, K.PRODUCT_NAME, K.ORDER_SIZE, K.ORDER_DATE, K.TOTAL_PRICE FROM ATTACHMENT A, MEMBER M, ( SELECT L.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, L.ORDER_SIZE, (L.ORDER_QUANTITY * P.PRODUCT_PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE, O.ORDER_DATE, P.MEMBER_NO FROM PRODUCT P, O_ORDER O, O_ORDER_LIST L WHERE L.PRODUCT_NO = #{ product_no } AND O.MEMBER_NO = #{ member_no } AND O.ORDER_NO = L.ORDER_NO AND P.PRODUCT_NO = L.PRODUCT_NO ) K WHERE A.PRODUCT_NO = K.PRODUCT_NO AND M.MEMBER_NO = K.MEMBER_NO AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES(SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ review_contents }, SYSDATE, #{ review_title }, #{ member_no }, #{ product_no }, #{order_no})
